vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Zec.6.10; also called Helem at Zec.6.14;
Another name of chel.day (חֶלְדַּי "Heldai" H2469)
§ Helem = "strength" or "dream"
a returned exile in the time of Zechariah; also spelled 'Heldai'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sacerdote; en tiempos del profeta Zacarías
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希連 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "力量" 或 "夢"
與撒迦利亞一起被擄歸回的人; 也叫黑玳 (亞6:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希连 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "力量" 或 "梦"
与撒迦利亚一起被掳归回的人; 也叫黑玳 (亚6:14)
